author: Sandor B.
description: Under this level of risk, damage to physical, psychological, legal or digital security can be severe or catastrophic
title: Extreme risk level

author: Sandor B.
description: In high levels of risk, journalists may suffer serious physical, psychological, legal or digital damage.
title: High risk level

author: Sandor B.
description: Insults, bad treatment, defamation campaigns, some cyber-attacks, are examples of these risks.
title: Low risk

author: Sandor B.
description: Insults, bad treatment, defamation campaigns, some cyber-attacks, are examples of these risks.
title: Moderate risk
